text.0: surya hath sent aloft his beams of splendour oer all the tribes of men in countless places.
text.1: together with the heaven he shines apparent formed by his makers well with power and wisdom.
text.2: so hast thou mounted up before us sūrya through these our praises with fleet dappled horses.
text.3: declare us free from all offence to mitra and varuṇa and aryaman and agni.
text.4: may holy agni varuṇa and mitra send down their riches upon us in thousands.
text.5: may they the bright ones make our praisesong perfect and when we laud them grant us all our wishes.
text.6: o undivided heaven and earth preserve us us lofty ones your nobiyborn descendants.
text.7: let us not anger varuṇa nor vāyu nor him the dearest friend of mortals mitra.
text.8: stretch forth your arms and let our lives be lengthened with fatness dew the pastures of our cattle.
text.9: ye youthful make us famed among the people hear mitravaruṇa these mine invocations.
text.10: now mitra varuṇa aryaman vouchsafe us freedom and room for us and for our children.
text.11: may we find paths all fair and good to travel preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
